channel.title: Command Line on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in Command Line on Coding notes

item.title: Passing arguments to scripts (both `bat` and `bash`)
Create file from command line in Windows
item.description: Create a file with some content from command line in windows from any console echo "whate ever content" > filename.txt

item.title: Change directory to different drive in Windows cmd
item.description: To change from C drive to D drive, going cd D: or any similar, doesn’t work. Instead go: C:\Users\bustroker> d: D:\>

item.title: A cool terminal for windows with context menu
item.description: No installation, cool colors, with context menu to open directly in a folder. Install Donwload cmder terminal, unzip, copy to the folder you prefer (just not any Administrator-required-to-work-on folder). Context menu shortcut To add Shortcut in context menu for Open Cmder here, open a cmd as Administrator, and go: cd c:\cmder\folder .\cmder.exe /REGISTER ALL
